DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized Comparison Titanium-Nitride-Oxide Coated Stent ( Helistent Titan2 , Hexacath ) With Zotarolimus-Eluting Stent ( EndeavorTm , Medtronic ) Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Comparing Titan Stent With Zotarolimus-Eluting Stent
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : The purpose study compare Titanium-Nitride-Oxide Coated Stent ( Helistent Titan2 , Hexacath ) Zotarolimus-Eluting Stent ( EndeavorTm , Medtronic ) non-inferiority trial . Design : Prospective , multi-center , randomize , non-inferiority trial conduct 3 Swiss interventional cardiology center . Patients randomize single-blind fashion ( 1:1 randomization ) either Titanium-Nitride-Oxide Coated Stent ( Helistent Titan2 , Hexacath ) Zotarolimus-Eluting Stent ( EndeavorTm , Medtronic ) . Study Population : Patients symptomatic coronary artery disease include patient chronic stable angina , silent ischemia , unstable angina , non-ST elevation myocardial infarction , qualify percutaneous coronary intervention Antiplatelet Therapy : Aspirin 100 mg qd indefinitely ; Clopidogrel 75 mg qd 3 month Enrollment : A total 300 patient enrol All patient undergo repeat angiography 6-8 month . All patient follow 5 year .
DOC.criteria: The following patient eligible inclusion 1 . Age â‰¥18 year 2 . Symptomatic coronary artery disease include patient chronic stable angina , silent ischemia , unstable angina , nonST elevation myocardial infarction 3 . Presence one coronary artery stenoses > 50 % native coronary artery 2.25 4.0 mm diameter cover one multiple stent ; 4 . No limitation number treat lesion , vessel , lesion length 1 . Pregnancy 2 . Known intolerance aspirin , clopidogrel , heparin , stainless steel , titan , zotarolimus contrast material 3 . Inability provide inform consent 4 . Currently participate another trial reach first endpoint 5 . ST segment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI )
